code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import noteContext from'../Constaxt/notes/noteContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Noteitem=props=>{const{note,updateNote,showalert}=props;const context=useContext(noteContext);const{deleteNote}=context;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" mb-3 ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:note.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-trash mx-3",onClick:()=>{deleteNote(note._id);showalert("Delete Note Succesfully","success");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-pen-to-square mx-3",onClick:()=>{updateNote(note);}})]})})})})});};export default Noteitem;
